alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Wayne; White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 10 at 9:58AM CST until March 17 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Illinois... Little Wabash River at Carmi. .Due to recent heavy rainfall, the Little Wabash River at Carmi is in minor flooding. It is forecast to rise to a crest early this weekend, then slowly fall, dropping below flood stage next week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Wabash River at Carmi. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM CST Thursday the stage was 28.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 29.4 feet Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
